title: MOTOROLA tab g70 LTE 4 GB RAM 64 GB ROM 11 inch with Wi-Fi+4G Tablet (Modernist Teal)

product_specification.Additional Features: Dual Microphone Array + Smart Voice DSP (Mid-field), TUV Certified Eye Protection
product_specification.Sales Package: Tablet, Sim Card ejector tool, 20W Charger, USB A to C Cable
product_specification.Sensors: Accelerometer, Ambient Light sensor, Hall Sensor, ToF Sensor(Time of Flight), Vibrator, Gyroscope
product_specification.Audio Formats Supported: Dual Microphone Array + Smart Voice DSP (Mid-field)
product_specification.Warranty Summary: 1 Year on Tab device and 6 months on battery and accessories

product_description.Stunning HD Display: The Motorola g70 LTE tablet features a 27.94 cm (11) FHD 2K IPS LCD display with a bezel-less design to give your eyes a visual delight while streaming your favourite content. And, with 400 nits of brightness, you can enjoy an immersive visual experience, thus ensuring that your eyes remain free from strain.
product_description.TUV Rheinland Certification: Enjoy low-light protection and a flicker-free experience, thanks to the TUV Rheinland certification on this tablet. This helps to offer blue light reduction and minimised reflection to ensure that your binge-watching sessions are immersive and smooth.
product_description.In-built Netflix and Amazon: This tablet enables HD Amazon and Netflix playback so that you can experience crystal-clear visuals while streaming your favourite content.
product_description.MediaTek Helio G90T Processor: Thanks to the MediaTek Helio G90T octa-core processor, you can experience powerful and lag-free performance while streaming your favourite movies or gaming. Also, this tablet comes with up to 4 GB of RAM so that you can enjoy running multiple apps, including gaming, streaming content or working without any interruptions.
product_description.Immersive Dolby Atmos Speakers: This Motorola tablet is equipped with an immersive Dolby Atmos Quad-speaker that allows you to create cinematic ambience while playing your favourite music tracks or streaming movies.
product_description.Long-lasting Battery Capacity: Stream your favourite movies, TV shows, or listen to your favourite music for long hours without significant interruption, thanks to the enduring battery capacity, which keeps you connected to entertainment for hours. This tablet also comes with a 20 W Rapid charging cable so that you can quickly charge your device as soon as you find yourself running out of battery.
product_description.Google Entertainment Hub: You don't have to switch between multiple platforms to find popular content as this tablet comes with Google Entertainment Hub that allows you to enjoy trending shows, movies, games and books in one place.
product_description.Sleek and Sturdy Design: This tablet features a dual-tone metal design to offer an aesthetic look to the device, while the high-quality aluminium alloy on its construction ensures sturdy usage.
product_description.User-friendly Experience: Thanks to the Android 11 optimization, you can enjoy a secured, ad-free, and bloatware-free experience on this tablet. This customization allows you to effortlessly control your privacy settings, conversations, and more, thus ensuring a user-friendly experience.
product_description.4G VoLTE and Dual Band Wi-fi Connectivit: This tablet comes with 4G VoLTE connectivity so that you can enjoy blazing-fast internet speed while streaming content or gaming. Also, it features Dual-band Wi-Fi that offers an enhanced connectivity speed.
product_description.Spacious Memory Storage: This tablet is equipped with up to 64 GB of in-built storage along with expandable storage of up to 1 TB that allows you to store your favourite images, songs, movies, and more.
product_description.Enhance your Virtual Hangouts: Whether you are attending a business conference or working on a class project, you can avail clear audio communication, thanks to the Dual Microphone Array system.

review:
I would like to give few pointers for this tablet.

Design is awesome
Display is very good( If you have good quality videos)
Processor is good at this Price range.
Pubg New state, modern combat, shadow fight can Be played very well without lag or frame drop. There might little frame drop while playing pubg but it's okay.
Camera is not good.
Battery backup is too good, I'm continuously using tablet for 7 hours, testing all the apps and games.
Charging tablet might take good amount of time.
Storage - around 50 GB available on initial boot.
U might feel little heat over back side of the tablet after heavy usage.

I think I have covered most of the questions which people have doubts over this tablet.

I will give my second review after 10 days of usage.

Beautiful and sleek tablet for daily use. Stock interface is the best thing about moto but
1. Some apps are yet to be optimised for landscape mode.
2. Battery management is again a drawback.
3. Sliding for notifications or shortcut bar doesn't work at the corners while on landscape mode.
4. You will have a tough time with OTT platforms for your fav movies(streaming quality fluctuates alot being of fibernet Wifi)

But, the best part is all these things will get resolved with upcoming updates. ...
READ MORE

This a good tablet for the price. The display is good for media consumption and day to day usage. Colors and viewing angles are good but sometime images and texts appear bit soft. Sound quality is good and loud. The camera is average and needs improvement. The haptic feedback for typing is bad. Build quality is excellent and it feels premium. The ui is clean but it needs optimization. There is minor lag all over and though performance is good enough for daily use it doesn't feel fluid enough. In fact the hardware is quite good but moto needs to provide software update asap to fix the issues. Wish there was a physical fingerprint scanner integrated in the power button. Overall its a good buy but Motorola needs to provide regular software updates to improve the user experience.

Best in class.

Pros :-

-Powerful Processor at this segment.
-Beautiful design & slim tab.
-Big battery.
-Stock Android.
-Good camera. (3.5/5.0)
-2 major updates of Android 12 and 13 was promised.
-Display quality is very good. (4.4/5.0)
-Smooth tab. Best for students and daily users. (Not for heavy game. )

Cons:-

-Price (should be 20k) but I am ok with it.
-Low refresh rate. (But not a major prblm. )
-Takes 1.5 hour + for full charge.
-Not give a flagship experience.
- Completely Made in CHINA product.

It is the best table and affordable one.
Best for entertainment, study and gaming.
Great speaker 🔊🔊 and performance. And good battery life and display is good. Highly recommend it....😎😎.

Overall product is better but not best.
Box content :- tablet, USB to type C cable and 20W charger moto not provided cover and tamper glass in the box in Indian variant when as both item are available in the Brazilian variant.
Sounds better not best
Display good
UI not optimised according to tablet it's filling like big mobile.
No 3.5mm jack
Back side plastic portion heating when you use.
Day to day life parformance is decent

If use extende you budget 22k to 27K and you are use to from IOS please buy ipad 9th generation in sale.

I don't have any complaint about the product.
It is pretty much as I have expected. It comes with great display,good battery backup, stable processor and average camera.
Overall at this price its a great product.My first impressions towards it are very positive.
However I received this after 20 days of my order placement. So that's a bummer. I mean it's 2022. I think Flipkart can do better then this.

This moto tab is awesome and budget range with big battery life and powerful processor but I am little bit not happy because motorola not give the backcover and the screen guard in box this type of thing little bit annoying me but the product was best and value for money 👍👍

Thankyou!!

Yes the product is absolutely beast in terms of performance. But there are some cons in the product. The battery backup is decent that is expected from a tablet and also come with a rapid charger of 20w . Camera is ok for attending meetings and taking online class. Display is quite good as compared to other tablet in market. Now comes the beast it's processor. You can do your daily task at ease and play around a handful of games at high graphics. Stylus support is there but it's not accurate so don't waste your money.

That's all about the product.
In one word awesome tablet just awesome ❤️....I used this tab since 1week,and this is one of the best tablet out there...at this price range this is wonderful tablet in the market😍🥰

Superb product from Moto😍

Look: Very beautiful slim design with very attractive colour, give it a very premium look.

Display: 2K display looks very sharp and vibrant and produce colours of premium displays and gives awesome feeling during media consumption.

Sound: Dolby Atmos speaker's sound quality is so good, crispy and loud👌

Camera: Main camera is Good enough, but front camera is not soo good, looks like webcam only not selfies obviously, but it can fulfill the need for video calls and zoom meetings very nicely.

Performance: Very smooth and powerful in performance. No lag at all in app switching or anything.

Battery: 7700mah works so finely. On heavy usage can complete a day without charge.

Firstly a terrific product from moto. I always loved moto for their pure Android experience. Same with this tab as well..it is very nice big and nice display. Couple of issues with software. Hopefully will be sorted in next releases.

Best tablet for the range. It works well as it is suppose to with lenovo precision pen 2, but beware, get a screen guard first as the pen might cause micro scratches on the screen. I felt this was a better choice than the lenovo chrome duet as the performance is much better. The tablet is thin and the battery lasts for more than 14 hours of regular continous use. It is very hard to get accesories, either Motorola or lenovo should release accesories for it officially. Tablet mildly gets warm while gaming and this is expected. Build quality is great and the ips screen gives good vibrant colours but the PPI could have been a bit better. There is a productivity mode and can be triggered under the display timeout settings. Split screen option doesn't work unfortunately. Over all, it is a great allroundef and a great buy

Finally the much awaited tab from moto is here...

Pros
1. An excellent display, watching videos is a treat.
2. A really good quad speaker setup, Dolby Atmos does its job quite well.
3. A snappy processor, better when compared to snapdragon 662 or the helio p22t.
4. No bloatware.
5. A premium body.
6. An okay front camera for video calls.

Cons
1. 64 gb internal storage, 128 which is already offered in the lenovo tab p11 would have been better, basically this is the lenovo tab p11 with a better processor and a lesser rom.
2. I personally find the white colour of the p11 to be more premium.
3. A lack of optimised apps for the device.
4. A lack of official accessories for the tablet.
5. No pre-installed screen protector, atleast a plastic film would have been nice.

P.S. The covers available for lenovo tab p11 perfectly fit this model, so feel free to go for them as the variety of covers and cases offered under the name of moto tab g70 is really pathetic.

Overall a really nice buy for the buck. Decent for gaming, attending meetings, watching lectures, one could even use this as an e-book reader with an anti glare screen protector.
Happy buying if you decide to go for it. :)
Good quality

pros.7700 mAh Battery: This tablet comes with a massive 7700 mAh battery and a 20W rapid charger which is a perfect combination to last it for a long time without any interruption.
pros.27.94 cm (11) FHD 2K IPS LCD display: This tablet features a 27.94 cm (11) FHD 2K IPS LCD display which is of amazing quality and gives our eyes a visual delight while using this tablet.
pros.Performance: This tablet has a snappy MediaTek Helio G90T octa-core processor which is far better compared to snapdragon 662 and gives a powerful and lag-free performance.

cons.Camera: The 13MP camera is just average at this price point and should have been better. It is very low quality and produces poor images.
cons.Headphone Jack: No headphone jack is present in this tablet which is a disappointment.

summary.verdict: The MOTOROLA tab g70 is a beautiful and sleek tablet perfectly suited for daily use.
summary.Additional Information: Quad speakers with Dolby audio, Supports sim, Gorilla glass 3.
